snippet: The naming is in recognition of a $3 million gift given to the Museum of the Moving Image by the charitable foundation of Mr. Redstone, the executive chairman of Viacom Inc. and CBS Corporation.
abstract: The naming is in recognition of a $3 million gift given to the Museum of the Moving Image by the charitable foundation of Mr. Redstone, the executive chairman of Viacom Inc. and CBS Corporation.

headline.main: Museum of the Moving Image Naming Theater for Sumner M. Redstone
headline.print_headline: Moving Image Museum To Have Redstone Theater
